function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inequality in access to technology and data","Impact":"Widening disparities in health outcomes","Mitigation":"Investment in technology infrastructure and data accessibility for underprivileged communities","Technologies":"Digital inclusion programs, community technology centers","People":"Underprivileged communities, marginalized populations","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Limited access to healthcare data","Impact":"Reduced ability to monitor and respond to public health crises","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health data sharing protocols, data standardization","Technologies":"Health information exchange platforms, interoperable health data systems","People":"Public health agencies, government health departments","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Lack of citizen engagement in smart city initiatives","Impact":"Ineffective utilization of data for public health crisis management","Mitigation":"Community engagement programs, participatory data collection methods","Technologies":"Citizen science platforms, community data collection apps","People":"Ordinary citizens, civil society organizations","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"}]}
